aiSettings.title: AI Message Settings

aiSettings.temperatureDesc: Controls randomness. Lower values are more focused, higher values are more creative.
aiSettings.maxTokensDesc: Maximum number of tokens in the response.
aiSettings.topPDesc: Alternative to temperature. Consider tokens with top_p probability mass.
aiSettings.frequencyPenaltyDesc: Reduces repetition by penalizing tokens based on frequency. Positive values decrease repetition.
aiSettings.presencePenaltyDesc: Encourages new topics by penalizing tokens that have appeared. Positive values increase diversity.

keyboardSettings.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
keyboardSettings.description: Customize shortcuts to match your workflow
keyboardSettings.customShortcutsAlert: You have {count} custom shortcut(s) configured. Custom shortcuts are highlighted with a colored border.
keyboardSettings.allShortcutsDesc: Click the edit button to customize any shortcut
keyboardSettings.tip1: Press / anywhere to focus the chat input
keyboardSettings.tip2: Use Ctrl+K to open the command palette
keyboardSettings.tip3: Press Esc to stop AI generation
keyboardSettings.resetConfirmDesc: This will restore all keyboard shortcuts to their default values. Your custom shortcuts will be removed.

speechSettings.sttDescription: Configure voice input settings for dictation
speechSettings.systemSpeechDesc: Uses browser's built-in speech recognition. Fast and free, but accuracy varies by browser.
speechSettings.whisperDesc: Uses OpenAI Whisper API for high-accuracy transcription. Requires API key.
speechSettings.continuousModeDesc: Keep listening after each phrase (vs stopping after silence)
speechSettings.autoSendDesc: Automatically send message after voice input stops
speechSettings.autoStopSilenceDesc: Automatically stop listening after a period of silence
speechSettings.ttsDescription: Configure voice output settings for AI responses
speechSettings.enableTtsDesc: Allow AI responses to be read aloud
speechSettings.systemTtsDesc: Uses browser's built-in speech synthesis. Free and fast.
speechSettings.openaiTtsDesc: High-quality neural voices from OpenAI. Requires API key.
speechSettings.geminiTtsDesc: Native text-to-speech from Google Gemini 2.5. Requires API key.
speechSettings.edgeTtsDesc: Microsoft Edge neural voices. Free and high quality.
speechSettings.browserSupportNote: Speech features depend on browser support. Chrome and Edge have the best support for speech recognition.

workflowEditor.dragToAdd: Drag nodes to add them to the canvas
workflowEditor.name: Name
workflowEditor.startNodeDescription: Configure the workflow inputs. These will be available to all subsequent nodes.
workflowEditor.endNodeDescription: Configure the workflow outputs. Map values from previous nodes to the final output.
workflowEditor.maxConcurrencyHint: Maximum number of branches to execute simultaneously
workflowEditor.parallelNodeHint: Connect multiple nodes to this parallel node to execute them concurrently.
workflowEditor.subworkflowHint: Configure input and output mappings in the Inputs and Outputs tabs.
workflowEditor.webhookHint: Configure headers and authentication in the advanced settings.
workflowEditor.mergeHint: Connect multiple branches to this node to merge their outputs.

learningMode.title: Learning Mode
learningMode.noActiveSession: No active learning session. Start one to begin guided learning.

startDialog.title: Start Learning Session
startDialog.description: Define what you want to learn. The AI mentor will guide you through step-by-step discovery using the Socratic method.
startDialog.topic: What do you want to learn?
startDialog.topicPlaceholder: e.g., How does recursion work in programming?
startDialog.backgroundPlaceholder: Describe your current understanding of this topic...
startDialog.goalHint: Press Enter to add a goal

stats.engagementHigh: You're highly engaged! Keep it up!
stats.engagementLow: Try to stay engaged with the material.

notes.title: Learning Notes
notes.placeholder: Write a note about what you've learned...
notes.empty: No notes yet. Start taking notes to remember key insights!

history.noSessions: No completed sessions yet. Start learning to track your progress!

screenRecording.ffmpegRequired: FFmpeg is required for screen recording. Please install FFmpeg to use this feature.
screenRecording.clickAndDrag: Click and drag to select recording area
screenRecording.dragToAdjust: Drag to move, use handles to resize

videoEditor.title: Video Editor
videoEditor.selectFromSidebar: Select a recording from the sidebar to edit
videoEditor.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this recording? This action cannot be undone.
videoEditor.tauriRequired: Video editing requires the desktop app. Please use Cognia desktop to access this feature.
